name: Meathead's 10 to 1 Drop a Letter Quiz / Test | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
In this type of quiz, you will start with a 10 letter word, and then the next clue will drop a letter, and scramble it, to come up with the next clue.  This continues until you reach 1.

Jade water pipe

Remember, this is ten letters, two words, each five letters.
To put in a bad situation, as of animals
Place to grow flowers or vegetables
The span of a set of numbers, a place to play golf, or even a stove
A piece of cloth used to clean dishes
